Text:
This is just the 3 main albums.  There are a slew of singles, remixes, acoustic, live, soundtracks, collaborations, etc. that are missing from this torrent.  plus it's in 256Kbps mp3's

if anyone is interested in me putting together a full collection: email me a request at zerothdegree@gmail.com

(no offense to sandwichmonster. at least you have some good taste)
everything should be in ogg.  it's 'rms' free and superior quality.  thanks man.  can't wait to listen.
"wafflerevolution" I think you're referring to Filter's 2008 studio release "Anthems for the Damned" cuz' "Whonder What's Next" it's Chevelle's best album.
